ARABIC: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَٰدِقِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They say, 'When will this promise come about if you are telling the truth?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But they say: "When will this promise come to pass, if what you say is true?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They say: “If you are truthful, tell us when will this promise (of the Hereafter) be fulfilled?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They say, "When will this torment take place if what you say is true?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they say, “When will this promise come, if you are truthful?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They say: "When will this promise come to pass, if you are telling the truth"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they say: When shall this threat be (executed) if you are truthful?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They say, 'When shall this promise come to pass, if you speak truly?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they say: When (will) this promise (be fulfilled), if ye are truthful?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They ask, "When will this promise be fulfilled, if you are truthful?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they say: when will this promise be fulfilled, if ye say sooth?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They say, ‘When will this promise be fulfilled, if you are truthful?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They ask: When will this promise be (fulfilled)? - If ye are telling the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They say: "When will this promise (i.e. the Day of Resurrection) come to pass? if you are telling the truth."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They ask: 'When will this promise come, if you speak truthfully'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they say, “When will this promise be fulfilled, if you are truthful?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [67:25] And they say, to the believers: ‘When will this promise be [fulfilled], the promise of the gathering, if you are truthful?’, about it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And they) i.e. the disbelievers of Mecca (say: When (will) this promise) which you promised us ((be fulfilled), if ye are truthful) it will ever be fulfilled?
